notesStmt.note:
Preface on folio 1v, an index on folio 353v (col. 1).Formula of marriage contract 'according to the custom of the Ron communities', ('Ron' refers to Regensburg, Würzburg, Nuremberg), 'in 5149 [1389] in the town of Nuremberg', 'R. Mordekhai bar Yosef, the groom', 'Sherlin bat R. Ya῾aḳov ha-Leṿi' (folio 87v).
Shim῾on bar Shemu᾿el: inscribed with his name in the colophon, 5152 [1392] (folio 321r).
Ele῾azar bar Natan Lieberman: record of his death, 1540 (folio 352v). Records of birth of children and death, 15th and 16th centuries (folios 352v-353r). Notes on the expulsions and persecutions of Jews (e.g. Spain, Portugal, Austria) (folios 352v-353r). A Yiddish note (folio 354r).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script, partially punctuated, of the 14th century. Ya῾aḳov bar Mosheh: inscribed with his name in the colophon, 5152 [1392] (folio 321r), mentioned in a marginal note (folio 353r). Mosheh: inscribed with his name (folio 353r).
